description: The chief of police. Prone to tearing out what little hair he has left... and what`s left over turned white due to the stress of the job. He also has a chronic ulcer that always acts up whenever the Tank Police cause too much collateral damage. In arguments with the previous mayor, he comments in the introduction that tanks are insufficient for keeping the peace, and would prefer "replacing our guns with tactical nuclear weapons."
name: Shochou
